definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Fertilizer efficiency can be improved by adding mineral materials.
sentences.chinese: 將礦物材料用於肥料中，可以提高肥效，改良土壤。

sentences.english: Potassium humate can make the constuction of soil better and improve its fertilizer efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 腐植酸鉀具有改良土壤，增加肥效作用。

sentences.english: Garbage compost was studied for its fertilizer effeciency and soil improvement in red soil region.
sentences.chinese: 研究了在紅壤地區垃圾堆肥的肥效及改土效果。

sentences.english: A great city is the most mighty of dung-makers.
sentences.chinese: 一個大城市有着肥效極高的糞肥。

sentences.english: Therefore, composting can enhance fertilizer effect and utility value of the piggery waste.
sentences.chinese: 因此，堆肥化能提高豬場廢棄物肥效和利用價值。

sentences.english: There is no guano comparable in fertility with the detritus of a capital.
sentences.chinese: 任何鳥糞都沒有首都的垃圾肥效高。

definition: tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
